rows.label: qev093202_MSG0010
rows.name: Hey! Can I order a pizza?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0020
rows.name:
A good old thick-crust pizza,
with a little of everything on top. For two.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0030
rows.name:
Ah, I'm sorry, sir.
I'm afraid we're all out today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0040
rows.name: Out? ...Of everything?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0050
rows.name:
Yeah. For whatever reason, the Ma-non are
having some kind of big blowout.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0060
rows.name:
They ordered a LOT of pies.
Cleared out our entire supply of toppings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0070
rows.name:
You have GOT to be—
It just had to be today, didn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0080
rows.name:
Shoot. Why is it when you know you can't have something,
you just start craving it even more?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0090
rows.name: Oh, I know the feeling. It's the WORST, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0100
rows.name:
Hey, don't agree with me!
You need to do something about this, pronto![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0110
rows.name:
Well, uh, what am I supposed to do?
Don't suppose you'd settle for a plain cheese pizza?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0120
rows.name: Just CHEESE? How dare you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0130
rows.name: How would you feel if you went to a sushi bar,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0140
rows.name: and they went, "Sorry, we only have rice"? Huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0150
rows.name: I'd...probably put in a complaint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0160
rows.name:
Right, you see?
So get your ass moving, and fix this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0170
rows.name: Sir, I would love to, really, but—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0180
rows.name:
Even if you commissioned the Mediators,
it's still going to take a while at least...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0190
rows.name: Hm? Hold up. Mediators?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0200
rows.name:
Are you telling me BLADE's being used for
busywork like that nowadays?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0210
rows.name: Uh...yeah? I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0220
rows.name:
I'd heard the rumors, but wow.
Just how far the mighty have fallen...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0230
rows.name: But wait, an idea. It's coming to me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0240
rows.name: Heh. What perfect timing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0245
rows.name: I'm lookin' at one of BLADE's finest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0250
rows.name: Right. Special order.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0260
rows.name: For me—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0265
rows.name:
No, for all of us: Go forth and procure
our pizza toppings! On the double![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_JNK0270
rows.name: Commit

rows.label: qev093202_SEL0280
rows.name: Tell him you'll get it done on the triple.

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0290
rows.name:
You're really good at playing along.
I don't see that every day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0300
rows.name:
Unfazed by even my craziest whims...
Heh. I LIKE it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_JNK0310
rows.name: Whine

rows.label: qev093202_SEL0320
rows.name:
Tell Al you'll do it,
but only if he's coming along too.

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0330
rows.name: Tch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0335
rows.name:
Come to think of it, I guess I also count as
a BLADE—for the moment, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0340
rows.name:
Really though, you're more familiar with the
ins and outs of this stuff, aintcha?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0350
rows.name:
I'll lend you a hand, but I'll let you take the lead.
Fine with that, boss?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0360
rows.name:
All right, we're on the case.
C'mon, hit us with your shopping list.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0370
rows.name: Uh, okay... If you're sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0375
rows.name: Though, are you really that desperate for our pizza?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0380
rows.name: When I start something, I see it through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0385
rows.name: If I say I'll eat pizza, then pizza's what I'll eat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0390
rows.name:
And since you're putting us through all this trouble,
be sure to make it extra tasty![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093202_MSG0400
rows.name: Uhh...right.[ST:wait ]
